content: The interview went well. They asked about my trading algorithm and seemed genuinely interested in its potential. Waiting to hear back.
Met up with my mentor again. He's impressed with my progress and suggested I look into blockchain for potential integration with AI. New avenue to explore.
Just finished a two-day intensive course on blockchain fundamentals. My head is spinning with ideas on how to combine it with my trading strategies.
Received an offer from the quant firm! It's not exactly what I envisioned, but it's a start. Negotiating terms now. The journey continues, with more lessons learned and new horizons to explore.
